channel.title: Item currecy help

item.title: Item currecy help
item.dc:creator: @mostwanted8 mostwanted8
item.description:
@mostwanted8 wrote:

[code]hello every one i got some small problem here
i have a token shop i made it everything right in it
but when i check price of an item in the shop it says cost coins.
so i tryed working it out and i got to these codes

			if (MyShopID == 1) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" PkPoints"+ShopAdd);
				}else{
				if (MyShopID == 16) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" tokkul"+ShopAdd);
				}else{
				if (MyShopID == 40) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" donor points"+ShopAdd);
				}else{
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
			}}}

i tryed Adding mine under them like this

			if (MyShopID == 1) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" PkPoints"+ShopAdd);
				}else{
				if (MyShopID == 16) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" tokkul"+ShopAdd);
				}else{
				if (MyShopID == 40) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" donor points"+ShopAdd);
                                    }else{
				if (MyShopID == 17) {
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" tokken"+ShopAdd);					
                                    }else{
        sM(getItemName(removeID)+": currently costs "+ShopValue+" coins"+ShopAdd);
			}}}

when i did that i got 100 error wat have i done wrong[/code]

Read full topic
